# **`ramp.xds`** - e**X**tensible **D**ynamical **S**ystems

## *Extensible dynamical systems and nimble model building for mosquito-borne disease dynamics.*

## Install **`ramp.xds`**

To install the latest version from GitHub, run the following lines of
code in an R session.

    library(devtools)
    devtools::install_github("dd-harp/ramp.xds")

To get started, see the vignette [*Getting
Started*](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/GettingStarted.html),
and the [**SimBA**
Project](https://faculty.washington.edu/smitdave/simba/index.html)
website.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

**`ramp.xds`** is an R software package that supports
**Sim**ulation-**B**ased **A**nalytics
([**SimBA**](https://faculty.washington.edu/smitdave/simba/index.html))
and **R**obust **A**nalytics for **M**alaria **P**olicy
([**RAMP**](https://faculty.washington.edu/smitdave/ramp/index.html)).

## What is RAMP?

Malaria analytics is the systematic analysis of data for decision
support or to guide malaria policies. Simulation-based malaria analytics
is malaria analytics that uses dynamical systems. **RAMP** is short
acronym for a big idea about how to use simulation based analytics to
support iterative malaria analytics and adaptive malaria control.

Malaria involves non-linear interactions among humans, mosquitoes,
parasites, and malaria managers that are constantly changing in response
to control: it is a kind of complex adaptive system. Lewis Hackett
compared malaria to a game of chess:

> …malaria is so moulded and altered by local conditions that it becomes
> a thousand different diseases and epidemiological puzzles. Like chess,
> it is played with a few pieces, but is capable of an infinite variety
> of situations.

In other words, malaria systems are locally peculiar: small differences,
such as the behaviors of local humans and mosquitoes, can affect blood
feeding patterns, transmission, and the responses to control. Malaria
complexity, local peculiarity, and systematic changes in response to
control create enormous needs for policy, but our ability to fill those
needs is limited. Malaria analytics must make the most of limited data.
Malaria research & analytics need a systematic way of dealing with
complexity, local peculariaty, and uncertainty. This was the seed
crystal for RAMP.

RAMP was developed as a way of dealing with the uncertainty. We can’t
wish away the uncertainty, but we can do our best to characterize and
quantify uncertainty and propagate the uncertainty through analytics
pipelines we use to develop policy. Robust analytics have gone to great
lengths to ensure that the advice would not change if the analysis had
been done in another reasonable way.

This software, called **SimBA** (short for **Sim**ulation-**B**ased
**A**nalytics), was developed as a practical way of developing robust,
simulation-based analytics for malaria. Managing malaria involves a
large set of linked activities, and some of these come with a heavy
computational or quantitative load: data processing and curation;
conventional statistical analysis; scenario planning; and strategic
planning. *Simulation based analytics* – the application of dynamical
systems models of malaria transmission dynamics and control in malaria
analytics – play a key role through seamless integration of
retrospective data analysis, real-time decision support, and
evidence-based approaches to setting rational expectations about the
future. SimBA lowers the costs of doing all this robustly.

The [**SimBA**
project](https://faculty.washington.edu/smitdave/simba/index.html)
(**Sim**ultation-**B**ased **A**nalytics) is a suite of software
packages that have the goal of supporting routine malaria analytics:

- It was designed to enable nimble model building.

- The models play a role in developing **malaria intelligence** – a
  quantitative assessment of malaria built for policy evaluation.

- The software was designed for iterative engagement: the models can be
  reused and they can be modified.

- The software was designed for robust analytics; it is comparatively
  easy to build suites of models that cover the uncertainty, and
  functions enable development of analytics pipelines to propagate
  uncertainty.

- The software was designed for accountability; the analysis is
  transparent.

By nimble, we mean a lot of things. One of them is that software lowers
the costs of setting up, solving, analyzing, and applying dynamical
systems to model the mosquito ecology or the epidemiology, spatial
transmission dynamics, and control of malaria and other
mosquito-transmitted pathogens.

A core goal is to understand malaria transmission in terms of a
*changing baseline* (using
[**`ramp.forcing`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.forcing/) to model
the effects of weather, hydrology, …) that is *modified by vector
control* (using
[**`ramp.control`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.control/)).

## What is SimBA?

This package, **`ramp.xds`** handles core computation for a suite of six
software packages that support simulation-based analytics. SimBA
describes the collection.

SimBA includes **`ramp.xds`** and all its satellite packages (below).

SimBA has been designed to serve the needs of malaria programs, where
mathematical models are used for decision support and adaptive malaria
control in a defined geographical area. Mechanistic models that have
been fitted to data describing malaria in a place provide a synthesis of
*malaria intelligence.* These models can facilitate complex analysis,
extending our innate mental capabilities. By characterizing and
quantifying uncertainty, and then propagating the uncertainty through
the analysis, simulation-based analytics serve as a platform for giving
robust policy advice and for adaptive malaria control. As the needs of a
malaria program changes, the models can be modified – simplified or
extended – to serve the tasks at hand.

**`ramp.xds`** does core copmutation: the software makes it easy to
build and solves dynamical systems and outputs the predicted values of
standard, observable malaria metrics. It also provides some
computational support for qualitative analysis: it computes steady
states, stable orbits. In
[**`ramp.work`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.work/), we developed
algorithms that fit models and evaluate vector control; that develope
short term forecasts; and that enable scenario planning and strategic
planning.

Originally, **`ramp.xds`** was a single program, but it made sense to
split the software into several R packages. When it split, we started
using calling the software development project **SimBA**. In the narrow
sense, **SimBA** software includes six distinct R packages:

1.  **`ramp.xds`** handles setup, solving, plotting, and some analysis.
    It was developed to build and solve dynamical systems models for the
    epidemiology, transmission dynamics, and control of malaria and
    other mosquito-transmitted pathogens based on a well-defined
    mathematical framework. It includes a basic set of models – enough
    to design, verify, and demonstrate the basic features of modular
    software.

2.  [**`ramp.library`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.library/) is an
    extended library of models – stable code that has been tested and
    verified. It includes a large set of model families published in
    peer review that are not included in **`ramp.xds`** The ability to
    reuse code reduces the costs of replicating studies. Through this
    library, **`ramp.xds`** also supports nimble model building and
    analytics for other mosquito-borne pathogens.

3.  [**`ramp.control`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.control/) is a
    collection of disease control models for **`ramp.xds`**

4.  [**`ramp.forcing`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.forcing/) is a
    collection of utilities to model exogenous forcing in models for
    **`ramp.xds`**

5.  [**`ramp.demog`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/ramp.demog.md)
    is is a supplementary code library for **`ramp.xds`** that handles
    human demography and stratification, including vital dynamics and
    age structure.

6.  [**`ramp.work`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.work/) includes
    algorithms to apply the framework, include code to fit models to
    data and to do constrained optimization

**`ramp.xds`** is under active development. It supersedes two other
software packages, no longer under active development:
[**`exDE`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/exDE/) and
[**`MicroMoB`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/MicroMoB/). The history of
development of RAMP simulation software has been memorialized in a
[vignette](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/History.html).

The material in this website supports **`ramp.xds`** development and a
basic introduction.

## Contributing

**ramp.xds** aims to provide stable, reliable, reusable code for the
study of mosquito-borne pathogen dynamics and control using dynamical
systems. For information about how to contribute to the development of
ramp.xds, please read our article on
[Contributing](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/Contributing.html).

If you have any questions, comments, bug reports, or suggestions, the
first point of contact with the development team is through [GitHub
Issues](https://github.com/dd-harp/ramp.xds/issues). If you are
specifically submitting a bug report, please check out our [bug
reporting
guide](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/Contributing.html#sec8).
If you are interested in collaborating in extensive model development
(e.g. new mosquito model), please do not hesitate to contact the
authors, whose email addresses can be found in the `DESCRIPTION` file.

We welcome issues and encourage contribution regardless of experience;
the length of the contributing guide is not intended to be intimidating,
merely complete. It is the responsibility of the package maintainers to
help new contributors understand our conventions and guide contributions
to a successful conclusion.

## Acknowledgements

- This project was supported by a grant from the Bill and Melinda Gates
  Foundation, **Modeling for Adaptive Malaria Control** (INV 030600, PI
  = David L Smith, University of Washington).

- Support for *Adaptive Vector Control* is funded by grant **Spatial
  Targeting and Adaptive Vector Control for Residual Transmission and
  Malaria Elimination in Urban African Settings** (R01 AI163398, PI =
  David L Smith), from US National Institute of Allergies and Infectious
  Diseases (NIAID).

- Development of SimBA, RAMP and Adaptive Malaria Control was supported
  through collaboration with the [**Bioko Island Malaria Elimination
  Program**](https://www.mcd.org/focus-areas/featured-projects/bioko-island-malaria-elimination-project)
  and Uganda’s **National Malaria Control Division** and **Department of
  Health Information** in the [Uganda Ministry of
  Health](https://www.health.go.ug/)

- Development of this software benefited from funding and collaboration
  with the NIAID grant **Program for Resistance, Immunology,
  Surveillance & Modeling of Malaria in Uganda** (PRISM) (2U19AI089674,
  PIs = Grant Dorsey, University of California San Francisco; and Moses
  Kamya, Infectious Diseases Research Collaboration), which was part of
  the **International Centers of Excellence in Malaria Research**
  (ICEMR) program.

- Funding to develop models of West Nile Virus to support Harris County
  Public Health was funded by the NSF as part of a project, Computing
  the Biome (PI = Janos Sztipanovits). The project was part of the
  Convergence Accelerator program of the National Science Foundation,
  Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships (TIP) ([NSF
  2040688](https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=2040688) and
  [NSF
  2040688](https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=2134862),
  PI=Janos Sztipanovits, Vanderbilt University).

- We also acknowledge the importance of the mosquito working groups of
  **RAPIDD** (Research and Policy for Infectious Disease Dynamics),
  which was sponsored by the Fogarty International Center, NIH, and the
  Department of Homeland Security. The mosquito working groups were led
  by Professor Thomas Scott. RAPIDD was directed by F. Ellis McKenzie.

# Package index

## Model Building

Set up & Modify Models

### Basic Setup

Build and store **`xds`** model objects

- [`xds_setup()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_setup.md)
  : Build a Model and Configure All Components

- [`xds_setup_mosy()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_setup_mosy.md)
  : Build a Model of Mosquito Ecology

- [`xds_setup_aquatic()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_setup_aquatic.md)
  : Build a Model of Immature Mosquito Ecology

- [`xds_setup_human()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_setup_human.md)
  : Build a Model of Human / Host Epidemiology

- [`xds_setup_eir()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_setup_eir.md)
  : Build a Model for a single Human / Host Epidemiology forced by the
  EIR

- [`saveXDS()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/saveXDS.md)
  :

  saveRDS for `xds` Objects

- [`readXDS()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/readXDS.md)
  :

  readRDS for `xds` Objects

### Advanced Setup

Modules for aquatic mosquito ecology

- [`setup_exposure()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_exposure.md)
  : Set Up Exposure
- [`setup_travel_object()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_travel_object.md)
  : Setup the Travel Object
- [`change_K_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_K_matrix.md)
  : Change Mosquito Dispersal Matrix
- [`change_TimeSpent_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_TimeSpent_matrix.md)
  : Set up (or change) a Time Spent matrix
- [`add_variable()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/add_variable.md)
  : Add Variable

## Solve - Analyze - Visualize

Methods to solve or equations

### Solving

- [`xds_solve()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_solve.md)
  : Solve a Dynamical System
- [`burnin()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/burnin.md) :
  Burn In

### Analysis

Compute Steady States & Stable Orbits

- [`xds_steady()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_steady.md)
  :

  Solve for the steady state of a system of equations using
  [rootSolve::steady](https://rdrr.io/pkg/rootSolve/man/steady.html)

- [`xds_stable_orbit()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_stable_orbit.md)
  : Compute stable orbits

- [`steady_state_X()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_X.md)
  :

  Steady States for **X**

- [`steady_state_XH()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_XH.md)
  :

  Steady States for **XH**

- [`steady_state_M()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_M.md)
  :

  Compute steady states for **M**

- [`steady_state_MY()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_MY.md)
  :

  Compute steady states for **MY**

- [`steady_state_Y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_Y.md)
  :

  Compute steady states for **Y**

- [`steady_state_L()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_L.md)
  :

  Compute steady states for **L** Component Modules

### Visualization

Visualize Outputs

- [`xds_plot_PR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_PR.md)
  : Plot the prevalence / parasite rate (PR) from a model of human
  infection and immunity

- [`xds_lines_PR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_PR.md)
  : Add lines for the prevalence / parasite rate (PR) from a model of
  human infection and immunity

- [`xds_plot_EIR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_EIR.md)
  :

  Plot the EIR *vs.* time

- [`xds_lines_EIR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_EIR.md)
  :

  Add lines for the EIR *vs.* time

- [`xds_plot_M()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_M.md)
  : Plot adult mosquito population density

- [`xds_lines_M()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_M.md)
  : Add lines for adult mosquito population density

- [`xds_plot_Y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_Y.md)
  : Plot the density of infected and infective mosquitoes

- [`xds_lines_Y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_Y.md)
  : Add lines for the density of infected and infective mosquitoes

- [`xds_plot_Z()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_Z.md)
  : Plot the density of infected and infective mosquitoes

- [`xds_lines_Z()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_Z.md)
  : Add lines for the density of infected and infective mosquitoes

- [`xds_plot_Y_fracs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_Y_fracs.md)
  : Plot the fraction of infected and infective mosquitoes

- [`xds_lines_Y_fracs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_Y_fracs.md)
  : Add lines for the fraction of infected and infective mosquitoes

- [`xds_plot_Z_fracs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_Z_fracs.md)
  : Plot the fraction infective

- [`xds_lines_Z_fracs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_Z_fracs.md)
  : Add lines for the fraction of infected and infective mosquitoes

## Working with Models

### Get Parameters

Get model parameters

- [`get_XH_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_pars.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`get_MY_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_pars.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`get_L_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_L_pars.md)
  :

  Get parameters for the **L** Component module

- [`get_mean_forcing()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_mean_forcing.md)
  : Get mean forcing

- [`get_season()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_season.md)
  : Get the Seasonal Pattern

- [`get_trend()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_trend.md)
  : Get the trend parameters

- [`get_TimeSpent_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_TimeSpent_matrix.md)
  : Get the Time Spent Matrix

- [`get_K_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_K_matrix.md)
  : Get the Mosquito Dispersal Matrix

### Change Parameters

Change parameters

- [`change_XH_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_XH_pars.md)
  : Set new X parameter values

- [`change_MY_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_pars.md)
  : Set new MY parameter values

- [`change_L_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_L_pars.md)
  :

  Set **L** Component Parameters

- [`change_H()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_H.md)
  : Change human population density

- [`change_mean_forcing()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_mean_forcing.md)
  : Set mean forcing

- [`change_season()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_season.md)
  : Get seasonal pattern

- [`change_trend()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_trend.md)
  : Set the interpolating points

- [`change_TimeSpent_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_TimeSpent_matrix.md)
  : Set up (or change) a Time Spent matrix

- [`change_K_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_K_matrix.md)
  : Change Mosquito Dispersal Matrix

### Show

Show patterns for forced systems

- [`show_season()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/show_season.md)
  : Plot the seasonal pattern
- [`show_trend()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/show_trend.md)
  : Plot the Temporal Trend

## Blood Feeding & Transmission

Methods to compute terms describing blood feeding and transmission

- [`check_XY_interface()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_XY_interface.md)
  : Check the XY Interface
- [`make_residency_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_residency_matrix.md)
  : Create the Residency Matrix
- [`view_residency_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/view_residency_matrix.md)
  : View residence membership

### Time Spent

Set up Time Spent Matrices

- [`change_TimeSpent_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_TimeSpent_matrix.md)
  : Set up (or change) a Time Spent matrix
- [`get_TimeSpent_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_TimeSpent_matrix.md)
  : Get the Time Spent Matrix
- [`setup_TimeSpent()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_TimeSpent.md)
  : Make a time spent matrix, called TimeSpent
- [`setup_TimeSpent(`*`<as_matrix>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_TimeSpent.as_matrix.md)
  : Pass a pre-configured TimeSpent
- [`setup_TimeSpent(`*`<athome>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_TimeSpent.athome.md)
  : Make a mosquito dispersal matrix, called TimeSpent with a here /
  away
- [`make_TimeSpent_athome()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_TimeSpent_athome.md)
  : Make a mosquito dispersal matrix, called TimeSpent
- [`setup_TimeSpent(`*`<xy>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_TimeSpent.xy.md)
  : Develop a mosquito dispersal matrix from a kernel and xy-coordinates
- [`make_TimeSpent_xy()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_TimeSpent_xy.md)
  : Make a mosquito dispersal matrix, called TimeSpent
- [`TimeSpent()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/TimeSpent.md)
  : time spent
- [`TimeSpent(`*`<setup>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/TimeSpent.setup.md)
  : Compute time spent objects: setup for static models
- [`TimeSpent(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/TimeSpent.static.md)
  : Compute time spent objects: static models

### Exposure

Environmental Heterogeneity

- [`setup_exposure()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_exposure.md)
  : Set Up Exposure
- [`foi2eir()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/foi2eir.md)
  : Convert FoI to EIR
- [`ar2eir()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/ar2eir.md) :
  Convert AR to EIR
- [`make_exposure_pois()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_exposure_pois.md)
  : Make a Poisson Exposure Model Object
- [`make_exposure_nb()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_exposure_nb.md)
  : Make a nbson Exposure Model Object

## Habitats & Egg Laying

Mosquito Population Dynamic Interface

- [`view_habitat_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/view_habitat_matrix.md)
  : View habitat membership, \\N\\
- [`change_habitat_weights()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_habitat_weights.md)
  : Change Habitat Search Weights
- [`change_bad_habitat()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_bad_habitat.md)
  : Change Habitat Search Weights

## XH Component

Models of human / host infection dynamics - immunity - disease -
infectiousness - diagnostics and detection

- [`skill_set_XH()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_XH.md)
  :

  **XH** Skill Set

- [`check_XH()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_XH.md)
  : Check / update before solving

- [`dXHdt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dXHdt.md) :

  Compute **XH** Component Derivatives

- [`Update_XHt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_XHt.md)
  : Update X states for a discrete time system

- [`get_XH_vars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_vars.md)
  : Get Variables by Name

- [`get_XH_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_pars.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_XH_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_XH_pars.md)
  : Set new X parameter values

- [`F_I()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_I.md) : Size
  of effective infectious human population

- [`F_H()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_H.md) : Size
  of human population denominators

- [`F_infectivity()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_infectivity.md)
  : Infection blocking pre-erythrocytic immunity

- [`parse_XH_orbits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_XH_orbits.md)
  :

  Parse **XH** Outputs

- [`get_XH_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_inits.md)
  : A function to set up XH_obj

- [`change_XH_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_XH_inits.md)
  : Set new X parameter values

- [`HTC()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/HTC.md) :
  Compute the human transmitting capacity

- [`F_prevalence()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_prevalence.md)
  :

  Compute the *true* prevalence of infection / parasite rate

- [`F_ni()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_ni.md) :
  Compute Net Infectiousness (NI)

- [`F_pfpr_by_lm()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_lm.md)
  : Compute the prevalence of infection by light microscopy

- [`F_pfpr_by_rdt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_rdt.md)
  : Compute the prevalence of infection by RDT

- [`F_pfpr_by_pcr()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_pcr.md)
  : Compute infection prevalence by PCR

- [`xds_plot_X()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_X.md)
  : Basic plotting for epidemiological models

- [`xds_plot_XH()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_XH.md)
  : Basic plotting for epidemiological models

- [`steady_state_X()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_X.md)
  :

  Steady States for **X**

- [`steady_state_XH()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_XH.md)
  :

  Steady States for **XH**

### trivial

Specialized methods the trivial human model

- [`skill_set_XH(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_XH.trivial.md)
  :

  The **XH** Module Skill Set

- [`check_XH(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_XH.trivial.md)
  : Check / update before solving

- [`F_I(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_I.trivial.md)
  : Size of effective infectious human population

- [`F_H(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_H.trivial.md)
  : Size of the human population

- [`F_ni(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_ni.trivial.md)
  : Compute the NI

- [`F_prevalence(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_prevalence.trivial.md)
  : Compute the "true" prevalence of infection / parasite rate

- [`F_pfpr_by_lm(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_lm.trivial.md)
  : Compute the prevalence of infection by light microscopy

- [`F_pfpr_by_rdt(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_rdt.trivial.md)
  : Compute the prevalence of infection by RDT

- [`F_pfpr_by_pcr(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_pcr.trivial.md)
  : Compute the prevalence of infection by PCR

- [`F_infectivity(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_infectivity.trivial.md)
  : Infection blocking pre-erythrocytic immunity

- [`dXHdt(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dXHdt.trivial.md)
  :

  Handle Derivatives for the `trivial` **X**-Module

- [`Update_XHt(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_XHt.trivial.md)
  :

  Handle State Updating for the `trivial` **X**-Module

- [`make_XH_obj_trivial()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_XH_obj_trivial.md)
  : Make parameters for trivial human model

- [`parse_XH_orbits(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_XH_orbits.trivial.md)
  : parse the output of deSolve and return variables for the trivial
  model

- [`get_XH_pars(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_pars.trivial.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_XH_pars(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_XH_pars.trivial.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

### hMoI

A hybrid model of MoI (Multiplicity of Infection) for human infection
dynamics.

- [`skill_set_XH(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_XH.hMoI.md)
  :

  The **XH** Module Skill Set

- [`dXHdt(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dXHdt.hMoI.md)
  :

  Compute Derivatives for `hMoI` (**X** Module)

- [`make_XH_obj_hMoI()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_XH_obj_hMoI.md)
  : Make parameters for hybrid MoI human model

- [`steady_state_X(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_X.hMoI.md)
  :

  Compute Steady States for `hMoI` (**X**-Model)

- [`make_XH_inits_hMoI()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_XH_inits_hMoI.md)
  : Make inits for hybrid MoI human model

- [`F_I(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_I.hMoI.md)
  : Size of effective infectious human population

- [`F_H(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_H.hMoI.md)
  : Size of the human population

- [`F_infectivity(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_infectivity.hMoI.md)
  : Infection blocking pre-erythrocytic immunity

- [`F_prevalence(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_prevalence.hMoI.md)
  : Compute the "true" prevalence of infection / parasite rate

- [`F_ni(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_ni.hMoI.md)
  : Compute the "true" nievalence of infection / parasite rate

- [`F_pfpr_by_lm(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_lm.hMoI.md)
  : Compute the prevalence of infection by light microscopy

- [`F_pfpr_by_rdt(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_rdt.hMoI.md)
  : Compute the prevalence of infection by RDT

- [`F_pfpr_by_pcr(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_pfpr_by_pcr.hMoI.md)
  : Compute the prevalence of infection by PCR

- [`parse_XH_orbits(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_XH_orbits.hMoI.md)
  : parse the output of deSolve and return variables for the hMoI model

- [`change_XH_inits(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_XH_inits.hMoI.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`get_XH_pars(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_pars.hMoI.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_XH_pars(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_XH_pars.hMoI.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`HTC(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/HTC.hMoI.md)
  : Compute the HTC for the hMoI model

- [`check_XH(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_XH.hMoI.md)
  : Check / update before solving

- [`get_XH_vars(`*`<hMoI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_vars.hMoI.md)
  : Get Variables by Name

### SIS

“The SIS (Susceptible-Infected-Susceptible) model of human dynamics”

- [`dXHdt(`*`<SIS>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dXHdt.SIS.md)
  :

  `SIS` Derivatives Function (an **XH** Module)

- [`change_XH_inits(`*`<SIS>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_XH_inits.SIS.md)
  :

  `SIS` - Change Initial Values

- [`change_XH_pars(`*`<SIS>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_XH_pars.SIS.md)
  : Set new values for the SIS model

- [`get_XH_pars(`*`<SIS>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_pars.SIS.md)
  :

  Get *SIS* module parameters

### Human Population Dynamics

Methods for the human demography and aging

- [`Births()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Births.md) :
  Human (or Host) Population Birth Rate
- [`Births(`*`<zero>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Births.zero.md)
  : Human (or Host) Population Birth Rate

## MY Component

Adult mosquito ecology and infection dynamics

- [`skill_set_MY()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_MY.md)
  :

  The **MY** Module Skill Set

- [`check_MY()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_MY.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`dMYdt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dMYdt.md) :
  Compute Derivatives for an Adult Mosquito Model

- [`Update_MYt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_MYt.md)
  : Update States for a Adult Mosquito Model

- [`F_fqZ()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqZ.md) :
  Blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population

- [`F_fqM()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqM.md) :
  Blood feeding rate of the mosquito population

- [`F_eggs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eggs.md) :
  Number of eggs laid by adult mosquitoes

- [`MBaseline()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBaseline.md)
  : Adult Mosquito Bionomics - Baseline

- [`MBionomics()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBionomics.md)
  : Adult Mosquito Bionomics - Modified by Control

- [`get_MY_vars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_vars.md)
  : Return the variables as a list

- [`get_MY_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_pars.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_pars.md)
  : Set new MY parameter values

- [`get_MY_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_inits.md)
  : Return initial values as a vector

- [`change_MY_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_inits.md)
  : Set new MY parameter values

- [`get_MY_ix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_ix.md)
  :

  Get **MY** Variable Indices

- [`parse_MY_orbits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_MY_orbits.md)
  : parse the outputs and return the variables by name in a list

- [`steady_state_MY()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_MY.md)
  :

  Compute steady states for **MY**

- [`steady_state_Y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_Y.md)
  :

  Compute steady states for **Y**

- [`steady_state_M()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_M.md)
  :

  Compute steady states for **M**

- [`get_M()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_M.md) :
  Get mosquito population density

- [`get_Z()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_Z.md) :
  Get the density of infectious, blood feeding mosquitoes

### Visualization for Adult Mosquito

Basic Plotting

- [`xds_plot_M()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_M.md)
  : Plot adult mosquito population density
- [`xds_lines_M()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_M.md)
  : Add lines for adult mosquito population density
- [`xds_plot_Y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_Y.md)
  : Plot the density of infected and infective mosquitoes
- [`xds_lines_Y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_Y.md)
  : Add lines for the density of infected and infective mosquitoes
- [`xds_plot_Z()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_Z.md)
  : Plot the density of infected and infective mosquitoes
- [`xds_lines_Z()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_Z.md)
  : Add lines for the density of infected and infective mosquitoes
- [`xds_plot_Y_fracs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_Y_fracs.md)
  : Plot the fraction of infected and infective mosquitoes
- [`xds_lines_Y_fracs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_Y_fracs.md)
  : Add lines for the fraction of infected and infective mosquitoes
- [`xds_plot_Z_fracs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_Z_fracs.md)
  : Plot the fraction infective
- [`xds_lines_Z_fracs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_Z_fracs.md)
  : Add lines for the fraction of infected and infective mosquitoes

### Mosquito Demography

Specialized methods for NULL dynamics: a funtion generates values of Z
to force human infection dynamics

- [`setup_Omega()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_Omega.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix
- [`setup_Omega(`*`<xde>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_Omega.xde.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix
- [`setup_Omega(`*`<dts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_Omega.dts.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix
- [`make_Omega()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_Omega.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix for spatial RM model in
  continuous time
- [`make_Omega(`*`<xde>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_Omega.xde.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix for spatial RM model in
  continuous time
- [`make_Omega_xde()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_Omega_xde.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix for spatial RM model in
  continuous time
- [`make_Omega(`*`<dts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_Omega.dts.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix for spatial RM model in
  continuous time
- [`make_Omega_dts()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_Omega_dts.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix for spatial RM model in discrete
  time
- [`make_Upsilon()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_Upsilon.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix for spatial RM model in
  continuous time
- [`make_Upsilon(`*`<xde>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_Upsilon.xde.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix for spatial RM model in
  continuous time
- [`get_Omega()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_Omega.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix
- [`get_Upsilon()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_Upsilon.md)
  : Make the mosquito demography matrix

### EIP

Methods for the extrinsic incubation period (EIP)

- [`setup_eip_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_eip_obj.md)
  : Setup an EIP Bionomic Object
- [`F_eip()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eip.md) :
  Compute the EIP
- [`F_eip(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eip.static.md)
  : Static model patch emigration

### trivial

The trivial model for adult mosquitoes

- [`skill_set_MY(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_MY.trivial.md)
  :

  The **trivial** Module Skill Set

  : Run a check before solving

- [`F_fqZ(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqZ.trivial.md)
  : Blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population

- [`F_fqM(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqM.trivial.md)
  : Blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population

- [`F_eggs(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eggs.trivial.md)
  : Number of eggs laid by adult mosquitoes

- [`dMYdt(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dMYdt.trivial.md)
  :

  Handle derivatives for the `trivial` **MY** module

- [`Update_MYt(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_MYt.trivial.md)
  :

  Handle state updates for the `trivial` **MY** module

- [`MBaseline(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBaseline.trivial.md)
  : Macdonald-style adult mosquito bionomics

- [`MBionomics(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBionomics.trivial.md)
  : Macdonald-style adult mosquito bionomics

- [`get_MY_pars(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_pars.trivial.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_pars(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_pars.trivial.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_inits(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_inits.trivial.md)
  : Set new MY parameter values

- [`make_MY_obj_trivial()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_obj_trivial.md)
  : Make parameters for trivial aquatic mosquito model

- [`parse_MY_orbits(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_MY_orbits.trivial.md)
  : parse the output of deSolve and return variables for the trivial
  model

### basicM

Methods for basicM - adult mosquito ecology without infection dynamics.

- [`skill_set_MY(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_MY.basicM.md)
  :

  The **MY** Module Skill Set

- [`check_MY(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_MY.basicM.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`dMYdt(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dMYdt.basicM.md)
  :

  Compute Derivatives for **M** module `basicM`

- [`MBaseline(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBaseline.basicM.md)
  : Set mosquito bionomics to baseline

- [`MBionomics(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBionomics.basicM.md)
  : Set mosquito bionomics to baseline

- [`Update_MYt(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_MYt.basicM.md)
  : Derivatives for adult mosquitoes

- [`make_M_obj_basicM()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_M_obj_basicM.md)
  : Make parameters for GeRM ODE adult mosquito model

- [`F_fqZ(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqZ.basicM.md)
  : The net blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population in a
  patch

- [`F_fqM(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqM.basicM.md)
  : The net blood feeding rate of the mosquito population in a patch

- [`F_eggs(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eggs.basicM.md)
  : Number of eggs laid by adult mosquitoes

- [`make_MY_inits_basicM()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_inits_basicM.md)
  : Make inits for basicM adult mosquito model

- [`get_MY_vars(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_vars.basicM.md)
  : Return the variables as a list

- [`get_MY_pars(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_pars.basicM.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_pars(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_pars.basicM.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_inits(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_inits.basicM.md)
  : Set new MY parameter values

- [`parse_MY_orbits(`*`<basicM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_MY_orbits.basicM.md)
  : parse outputs for basicM

- [`steady_state_M(`*`<basicM_ode>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_M.basicM_ode.md)
  : Compute the steady states as a function of the daily EIR

- [`steady_state_M(`*`<basicM_dts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_M.basicM_dts.md)
  : Compute the steady states as a function of the daily EIR

### The “SI” model for infection

Specialized methods for simple infection dynamics for an adult mosquito
population

- [`skill_set_MY(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_MY.SI.md)
  :

  The **SI** Module Skill Set

- [`check_MY(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_MY.SI.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`dMYdt(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dMYdt.SI.md)
  :

  Compute Derivatives for **MY** module `SI`

- [`MBaseline(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBaseline.SI.md)
  : Macdonald-style adult mosquito bionomics

- [`MBionomics(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBionomics.SI.md)
  : Macdonald-style adult mosquito bionomics

- [`Update_MYt(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_MYt.SI.md)
  : Derivatives for adult mosquitoes

- [`make_MY_obj_SI()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_obj_SI.md)
  : Make parameters for SI ODE adult mosquito model

- [`F_fqZ(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqZ.SI.md)
  :

  Net Blood Feeding by Infectious Mosquitoes - `SI` Mosquito Model

- [`F_fqM(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqM.SI.md)
  :

  Compute Net Blood Feeding by Mosquitoes for `SI`

- [`F_eggs(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eggs.SI.md)
  :

  Compute Component Egg Laying Rates for `SI`

- [`get_MY_vars(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_vars.SI.md)
  : Return the variables as a list

- [`get_MY_pars(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_pars.SI.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_pars(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_pars.SI.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_inits(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_inits.SI.md)
  : change initial values for the macdonald model

- [`make_MY_inits_SI()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_inits_SI.md)
  :

  Make inits for `SI` adult mosquito model

- [`parse_MY_orbits(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_MY_orbits.SI.md)
  :

  parse the output of deSolve and return variables for the `SI` model

- [`get_f(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_f.SI.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_q(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_q.SI.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_g(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_g.SI.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_sigma(`*`<SI>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_sigma.SI.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`steady_state_MY(`*`<SI_ode>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_MY.SI_ode.md)
  : Steady States: MY-SI

### macdonald

Specialized methods for a Macdonald-style model of adult mosquito
dynamics - modified slightly from a model published by Joan Aron &
Robert May (1982).

- [`skill_set_MY(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_MY.macdonald.md)
  :

  The **macdonald** Module Skill Set

- [`check_MY(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_MY.macdonald.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`dMYdt(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dMYdt.macdonald.md)
  :

  Compute derivatives for the **MY** module `macdonald`

- [`MBaseline(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBaseline.macdonald.md)
  : macdonald-style adult mosquito bionomics

- [`MBionomics(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBionomics.macdonald.md)
  : macdonald-style adult mosquito bionomics

- [`steady_state_MY(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_MY.macdonald.md)
  : Compute the steady states as a function of the daily EIR

- [`make_MY_obj_macdonald()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_obj_macdonald.md)
  : Make parameters for macdonald ODE adult mosquito model

- [`get_MY_vars(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_vars.macdonald.md)
  : Return the variables as a list

- [`get_MY_pars(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_pars.macdonald.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_pars(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_pars.macdonald.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_inits(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_inits.macdonald.md)
  : change initial values for the macdonald model

- [`F_fqZ(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqZ.macdonald.md)
  : The net blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population in a
  patch

- [`F_fqM(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqM.macdonald.md)
  : The net blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population in a
  patch

- [`F_eggs(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eggs.macdonald.md)
  : Number of eggs laid by adult mosquitoes

- [`make_MY_inits_macdonald()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_inits_macdonald.md)
  : Make inits for macdonald adult mosquito model

- [`parse_MY_orbits(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_MY_orbits.macdonald.md)
  : parse the output of deSolve and return variables for the macdonald
  model

- [`get_f(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_f.macdonald.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_q(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_q.macdonald.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_g(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_g.macdonald.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_sigma(`*`<macdonald>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_sigma.macdonald.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

### GeRM

Specialized methods for a Ross-Macdonald-style model of adult mosquito
dynamics - modified slightly from a model published by Joan Aron &
Robert May (1982).

- [`skill_set_MY(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_MY.GeRM.md)
  :

  The **GeRM** Module Skill Set

- [`check_MY(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_MY.GeRM.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`dMYdt(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dMYdt.GeRM.md)
  :

  Compute Derivatives for **MY** module `GeRM`

- [`MBaseline(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBaseline.GeRM.md)
  : Set mosquito bionomics to baseline

- [`MBionomics(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/MBionomics.GeRM.md)
  : Set mosquito bionomics to baseline

- [`Update_MYt(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_MYt.GeRM.md)
  : Derivatives for adult mosquitoes

- [`steady_state_MY(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_MY.GeRM.md)
  : Compute the steady states as a function of the daily EIR

- [`make_MY_obj_GeRM()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_obj_GeRM.md)
  : Make parameters for GeRM ODE adult mosquito model

- [`get_MY_vars(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_vars.GeRM.md)
  : Return the variables as a list

- [`get_MY_pars(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_pars.GeRM.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_pars(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_pars.GeRM.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`change_MY_inits(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_MY_inits.GeRM.md)
  : Set new MY parameter values

- [`F_fqZ(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqZ.GeRM.md)
  : The net blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population in a
  patch

- [`F_fqM(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqM.GeRM.md)
  : The net blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population in a
  patch

- [`F_eggs(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eggs.GeRM.md)
  : Number of eggs laid by adult mosquitoes

- [`make_MY_inits_GeRM()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_inits_GeRM.md)
  : Make inits for GeRM adult mosquito model

- [`parse_MY_orbits(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_MY_orbits.GeRM.md)
  : parse the output of deSolve and return variables for the GeRM model

- [`get_f(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_f.GeRM.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_q(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_q.GeRM.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_g(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_g.GeRM.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

- [`get_sigma(`*`<GeRM>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_sigma.GeRM.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

### RM-Mosquito in discrete-time

Specialized methods for a Ross-Macdonald-style model of adult mosquito
dynamics - in discrete time.

- [`skill_set_MY(`*`<RMdts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_MY.RMdts.md)
  :

  The **RMdts** Module Skill Set

- [`check_MY(`*`<RMdts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_MY.RMdts.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`F_fqZ(`*`<RMdts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqZ.RMdts.md)
  : The net blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population in a
  patch

- [`F_fqM(`*`<RMdts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_fqM.RMdts.md)
  : The net blood feeding rate of the infective mosquito population in a
  patch

- [`F_eggs(`*`<RMdts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_eggs.RMdts.md)
  : Number of eggs laid by adult mosquitoes

- [`Update_MYt(`*`<RMdts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_MYt.RMdts.md)
  : Derivatives for adult mosquitoes

- [`get_MY_vars(`*`<RMdts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_vars.RMdts.md)
  : Return the variables as a list

- [`make_MY_inits_RMdts()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_MY_inits_RMdts.md)
  : Make inits for RMdts adult mosquito model

- [`parse_MY_orbits(`*`<RMdts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_MY_orbits.RMdts.md)
  : parse the output of deSolve and return variables for the RMdts model

## L Component (Immature Mosquitoes)

Generic methods for the aquatic (immature) mosquito component.

- [`skill_set_L()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_L.md)
  :

  The skill set (**L** module)

- [`check_L()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_L.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`dLdt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dLdt.md) :

  Compute derivatives (**L** module)

- [`Update_Lt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_Lt.md)
  :

  Update state variables (**L** module)

- [`F_emerge()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_emerge.md)
  : Compute Emergent Adults

- [`LBionomics()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/LBionomics.md)
  :

  Bionomics for an **L** Component Module

- [`LBaseline()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/LBaseline.md)
  :

  Baseline Bionomics for an **L** Component Module

- [`get_L_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_L_pars.md)
  :

  Get parameters for the **L** Component module

- [`change_L_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_L_pars.md)
  :

  Set **L** Component Parameters

- [`get_L_vars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_L_vars.md)
  :

  List **L** Component Variables

- [`change_L_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_L_inits.md)
  :

  Set **L** Component Initial Values

- [`get_L_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_L_inits.md)
  :

  Get Initial Values for the **L** Component

- [`parse_L_orbits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_L_orbits.md)
  :

  parse **L** Component Outputs

- [`steady_state_L()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_L.md)
  :

  Compute steady states for **L** Component Modules

### trivial

The trivial model for aquatic dynamics

- [`skill_set_L(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_L.trivial.md)
  :

  The **L** Module Skill Set

- [`F_emerge(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_emerge.trivial.md)
  :

  Compute Emergent Adults for `trivial` (**L** Component)

- [`check_L(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_L.trivial.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`make_L_obj_trivial()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_L_obj_trivial.md)
  :

  Make `L_obj` for `trivial` (**L** Component)

- [`change_L_pars(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_L_pars.trivial.md)
  :

  Set **L** Component parameters for `trivial`

### basicL

A basic model for aquatic mosquito dynamics

- [`skill_set_L(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/skill_set_L.basicL.md)
  :

  The **L** Module Skill Set

- [`check_L(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/check_L.basicL.md)
  : Run a check before solving

- [`dLdt(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dLdt.basicL.md)
  :

  Compute Derivatives for **L** module `basicL`

- [`Update_Lt(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_Lt.basicL.md)
  :

  Update State Variables for `basicL` (**L** Component)

- [`make_L_obj_basicL()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_L_obj_basicL.md)
  :

  Make `L_obj` for `basicL` (**L** Component)

- [`LBionomics(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/LBionomics.basicL.md)
  :

  Bionomics for `basicL` (**L** Component)

- [`LBaseline(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/LBaseline.basicL.md)
  :

  Baseline Bionomics for `basicL` (**L** Component)

- [`F_emerge(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_emerge.basicL.md)
  :

  Compute Emergent Adults for `basicL` (**L** Component)

- [`make_L_inits_basicL()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_L_inits_basicL.md)
  :

  Make Initial Values for `basicL` (**L** Component)

- [`get_L_vars(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_L_vars.basicL.md)
  :

  List **L** Component Variables for `basicL`

- [`get_L_pars(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_L_pars.basicL.md)
  :

  Get **L** Component Parameters for `basicL`

- [`change_L_pars(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_L_pars.basicL.md)
  :

  Set **L** Component parameters for `basicL`

- [`change_L_inits(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_L_inits.basicL.md)
  :

  Set the Initial Values for `basicL` (**L** Component)

- [`parse_L_orbits(`*`<basicL>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_L_orbits.basicL.md)
  :

  parse **L** Component Variables for `basicL`

- [`steady_state_L(`*`<basicL_ode>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/steady_state_L.basicL_ode.md)
  :

  Compute the Steady State of `dLdt.basicL` (**L** Component)

## Mosquito Bionomics

Methods to compute or update mosquito bionomic parameters

### Functional Responses

Compute bionomic parameters as functional responses to resource
availability

- [`setup_f_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_f_obj.md)
  : Setup Blood Feeding Bionomic Object
- [`F_feeding_rate()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_feeding_rate.md)
  : Compute the blood feeding rate, f
- [`F_feeding_rate(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_feeding_rate.static.md)
  : Constant baseline blood feeding rate
- [`setup_f_obj_B2()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_f_obj_B2.md)
  : Setup Blood Feeding Bionomic Object
- [`F_feeding_rate(`*`<B2>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_feeding_rate.B2.md)
  : Type 2 functional response for the blood feeding rate
- [`setup_q_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_q_obj.md)
  : Setup a Human Fraction Bionomic Object
- [`F_human_frac()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_human_frac.md)
  : Compute the blood qeeding rate, q
- [`F_human_frac(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_human_frac.static.md)
  : Static model for the blood feeding rate
- [`setup_g_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_g_obj.md)
  : Setup a Mosquito Mortality Bionomic Object
- [`F_mozy_mort()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_mozy_mort.md)
  : Compute the blood geeding rate, g
- [`F_mozy_mort(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_mozy_mort.static.md)
  : Static model for the blood feeding rate
- [`setup_sigma_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_sigma_obj.md)
  : Setup a Patch Emigration Bionomic Object
- [`F_emigrate()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_emigrate.md)
  : Compute the Mosquito Patch Emigration Rate
- [`F_emigrate(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_emigrate.static.md)
  : Static model patch emigration
- [`setup_sigma_obj_BQS()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_sigma_obj_BQS.md)
  : Setup Blood Feeding Bionomic Object
- [`F_emigrate(`*`<BQS>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_emigrate.BQS.md)
  : Model for mosquito emigration based on resource availability
- [`setup_mu_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_mu_obj.md)
  : Setup a Dispersal Loss Bionomic Object
- [`F_dispersal_loss()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_dispersal_loss.md)
  : Compute the emigration loss fraction
- [`F_dispersal_loss(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_dispersal_loss.static.md)
  : Static model for the blood feeding rate
- [`setup_nu_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_nu_obj.md)
  : Setup Laying Rate Bionomic Object
- [`F_batch_rate()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_batch_rate.md)
  : Compute the Mosquito Patch Emigration Rate
- [`F_batch_rate(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_batch_rate.static.md)
  : Static model patch emigration
- [`setup_nu_obj_Q2()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_nu_obj_Q2.md)
  : Setup Blood Feeding Bionomic Object
- [`F_batch_rate(`*`<Q2>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_batch_rate.Q2.md)
  : Type 2 Functional Response for Egg Laying
- [`setup_psi_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_psi_obj.md)
  : Setup a Human Fraction Bionomic Object
- [`F_maturation()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_maturation.md)
  : Compute the blood psieeding rate, psi
- [`F_maturation(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_maturation.static.md)
  : Static model for the blood feeding rate
- [`setup_phi_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_phi_obj.md)
  : Setup a Human Fraction Bionomic Object
- [`F_larval_mort()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_larval_mort.md)
  : Compute the blood phieeding rate, phi
- [`F_larval_mort(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_larval_mort.static.md)
  : Static model for the blood feeding rate
- [`setup_xi_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_xi_obj.md)
  : Setup a Human Fraction Bionomic Object
- [`F_dlay_maturation()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_dlay_maturation.md)
  : Compute the blood xieeding rate, xi
- [`F_dlay_maturation(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_dlay_maturation.static.md)
  : Static model for the blood feeding rate
- [`setup_theta_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_theta_obj.md)
  : Setup a Human Fraction Bionomic Object
- [`F_larval_dd_mort()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_larval_dd_mort.md)
  : Compute the blood thetaeeding rate, theta
- [`F_larval_dd_mort(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_larval_dd_mort.static.md)
  : Static model for the blood feeding rate

### Mosquito Dispersal

Specialized methods to set up mosquito dispersal matrices

- [`setup_K_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_K_obj.md)
  : Setup a Human Fraction Bionomic Object
- [`change_K_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_K_matrix.md)
  : Change Mosquito Dispersal Matrix
- [`get_K_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_K_matrix.md)
  : Get the Mosquito Dispersal Matrix
- [`setup_K_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_K_matrix.md)
  : Setup Mosquito Dispersal Matrix
- [`setup_K_matrix(`*`<as_matrix>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_K_matrix.as_matrix.md)
  : Setup a Here-There Dispersal Matrix
- [`setup_K_matrix(`*`<herethere>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_K_matrix.herethere.md)
  : Setup a Here-There Dispersal Matrix
- [`make_K_matrix_herethere()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_K_matrix_herethere.md)
  : Make a Here-There Dispersal Matrix
- [`setup_K_matrix(`*`<xy>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_K_matrix.xy.md)
  : Setup a Kernel-Based Mosquito Dispersal Matrix
- [`make_K_matrix_xy()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_K_matrix_xy.md)
  : make a Kernel-Based Mosquito Dispersal Matrix
- [`F_K_matrix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_K_matrix.md)
  : Compute the blood feeding rate, f
- [`F_K_matrix(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_K_matrix.static.md)
  : Constant baseline blood feeding rate

## Other Dynamic Variables

Compute the derivatives for other variables

### Other Dynamic Variables

Compute the derivatives for other variables

- [`add_variable()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/add_variable.md)
  : Add Variable

- [`setup_other_variables()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_other_variables.md)
  : Set Up the first (null) other variable

- [`dVdt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dVdt.md) :
  Compute Other Variables

- [`dVdt(`*`<setup>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dVdt.setup.md)
  : Compute Other Variables

- [`setup_V_ix(`*`<setup>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_V_ix.setup.md)
  : Compute Other Variables

- [`setup_V_obj()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_V_obj.md)
  :

  Setup an **V** Module (Human / Host Epidemiology & Demography)

- [`get_V_vars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_V_vars.md)
  : Get Variables by Name

- [`setup_V_ix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_V_ix.md)
  : Add indices for human population to parameter list

- [`parse_V_orbits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_V_orbits.md)
  :

  Parse **V** Outputs

- [`get_V_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_V_pars.md)
  : Return the parameters as a list

- [`get_V_ix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_V_ix.md)
  : Add indices for human population to parameter list

- [`change_V_pars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_V_pars.md)
  : Set new X parameter values

- [`setup_V_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_V_inits.md)
  :

  Setup Initial Values for **V** Modules

- [`get_V_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_V_inits.md)
  : A function to set up V_obj

- [`change_V_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_V_inits.md)
  : Set new X parameter values

### Junctions

Functions that compute dynamical terms and exogenous variables

- [`Forcing()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Forcing.md)
  : Exogenous Forcing
- [`Health()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Health.md) :
  Set the values variables for health-based malaria control
- [`VectorControl1()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/VectorControl1.md)
  : Vector Control, Stage 1
- [`VectorControl2()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/VectorControl2.md)
  : Vector Control, Stage 2
- [`Resources()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Resources.md)
  : Resources

## Ports & Junctions

### Junctions

Set up junction boxes to add features

### Forcing

Exogenous forcing (see `ramp.control`)

- [`setup_forcing_object()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_forcing_object.md)
  : Setup the Junction for Exogenous Forcing
- [`Forcing()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Forcing.md)
  : Exogenous Forcing
- [`Forcing(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Forcing.none.md)
  : Exogenous Forcing

### Vector Control

The ports for vector control

- [`setup_vector_control_object()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_vector_control_object.md)
  : Setup the Vector Control Junction
- [`VectorControl1()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/VectorControl1.md)
  : Vector Control, Stage 1
- [`VectorControl1(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/VectorControl1.none.md)
  : Compute Vector Control Effect Sizes
- [`VectorControl2()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/VectorControl2.md)
  : Vector Control, Stage 2
- [`VectorControl2(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/VectorControl2.none.md)
  : Set the values of exogenous variables

### Health

The ports for malaria control

- [`setup_health_object()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_health_object.md)
  : none set up for exogenous health
- [`Health()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Health.md) :
  Set the values variables for health-based malaria control
- [`Health(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Health.none.md)
  : Set no exogenous health variables

### Resources

The ports for resources

- [`setup_resources_object()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_resources_object.md)
  : Setup Resources Object
- [`Resources()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Resources.md)
  : Resources
- [`BloodFeeding()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/BloodFeeding.md)
  : Blood feeding
- [`EggLaying()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/EggLaying.md)
  : Compute eggs laid
- [`Traps()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Traps.md) :
  Set up Mosquito traps
- [`BaselineBionomics()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/BaselineBionomics.md)
  : Set bionomic parameter rates relative to baseline
- [`ModifiedBionomics()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/ModifiedBionomics.md)
  : Set bionomic parameter rates relative to baseline
- [`Transmission()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Transmission.md)
  : Compute the mixing matrix and transmission terms
- [`Exposure()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Exposure.md)
  : Compute Infection Rates

### Travel

Time spent traveling & the travel EIR

- [`setup_travel_object()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_travel_object.md)
  : Setup the Travel Object
- [`change_time_at_home()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_time_at_home.md)
  : Change the travel EIR
- [`change_travel_EIR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_travel_EIR.md)
  : Change the travel EIR
- [`setup_F_travel()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_travel.md)
  : Set up no travel
- [`setup_F_travel(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_travel.static.md)
  : Set up no travel
- [`setup_F_travel(`*`<ts_func>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_travel.ts_func.md)
  : Set up no travel
- [`setup_F_travel_eir()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_travel_eir.md)
  : Setup the Travel EIR
- [`setup_F_travel_eir(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_travel_eir.static.md)
  : Set up no travel
- [`setup_F_travel_eir(`*`<ts_func>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_travel_eir.ts_func.md)
  : Setup the Travel EIR
- [`Travel()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Travel.md) :
  Time Spent F_travel
- [`Travel(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Travel.static.md)
  : Time Spent F_travel
- [`Travel(`*`<setup>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Travel.setup.md)
  : Time Spent F_travel
- [`Travel(`*`<dynamic>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Travel.dynamic.md)
  : Time Spent F_travel
- [`travel_dynamics()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/travel_dynamics.md)
  : Time Spent Here

### Visitors

Blood Feeding on non-Residents

  : Set up no visitors
- [`setup_F_vis_kappa(`*`<ts_func>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_vis_kappa.ts_func.md)
  : Set
- [`setup_F_visitors()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_visitors.md)
  : Set up no visitors
- [`setup_F_visitors(`*`<ts_func>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_F_visitors.ts_func.md)
  : Set up no visitors
- [`setup_visitor_object()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/setup_visitor_object.md)
  : Setup the Visitors Object
- [`visitor_dynamics()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/visitor_dynamics.md)
  : Availabilit of Visitors
- [`Visitors()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Visitors.md)
  : Visitors

  : Visitor Dynamics
