  : Visitors
- [`Visitors(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Visitors.static.md)
  : Visitors

## Solving

Methods to compute the derivatives and dynamical systems

### Solve

- [`make_times_dts()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_times_dts.md)
  : Times Utility for Discrete Time Systems
- [`make_times_xde()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_times_xde.md)
  : Times Utility for Differential Equations

### Derivatives

- [`xde_derivatives()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xde_derivatives.md)
  : Compute Derivatives
- [`xde_derivatives(`*`<full>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xde_derivatives.full.md)
  : Generalized spatial differential equation model
- [`xde_derivatives(`*`<aquatic>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xde_derivatives.aquatic.md)
  : Differential equation models for aquatic mosquito populations
- [`xde_derivatives(`*`<mosy>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xde_derivatives.mosy.md)
  : Generalized spatial differential equation model (mosquito only)
- [`xde_derivatives(`*`<human>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xde_derivatives.human.md)
  : Differential equations isolating the humans, forced with Ztrace
- [`xde_derivatives(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xde_derivatives.eir.md)
  : Differential equation models for aquatic mosquito populations

### Compute Terms

- [`xds_compute_terms()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_compute_terms.md)
  : Compute Derivatives
- [`xds_compute_terms(`*`<aquatic>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_compute_terms.aquatic.md)
  : Differential equation models for aquatic mosquito populations
- [`xds_compute_terms(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_compute_terms.eir.md)
  : Differential equation models for aquatic mosquito populations
- [`xds_compute_terms(`*`<full>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_compute_terms.full.md)
  : Generalized spatial differential equation model
- [`xds_compute_terms(`*`<human>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_compute_terms.human.md)
  : Differential equations isolating the humans, forced with Ztrace
- [`xds_compute_terms(`*`<mosy>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_compute_terms.mosy.md)
  : Generalized spatial differential equation model (mosquito only)

### DTS Update

- [`dts_update()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update.md)
  : dts_update\_ States for Discrete-Time Systems

- [`dts_update(`*`<full>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update.full.md)
  : Generalized spatial differential equation model

- [`dts_update(`*`<aquatic>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update.aquatic.md)
  : Difference equation models for aquatic mosquito populations

- [`dts_update(`*`<mosy>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update.mosy.md)
  : Generalized spatial differential equation model (mosquito only)

- [`dts_update(`*`<human>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update.human.md)
  : Difference equations isolating the humans, forced with Ztrace

- [`dts_update(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update.eir.md)
  : Difference equation models for aquatic mosquito populations

- [`dts_update_Lt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update_Lt.md)
  : Difference equations isolating the humans, forced with Ztrace

- [`dts_update_MYt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update_MYt.md)
  : Difference equations isolating the humans, forced with Ztrace

- [`dts_update_XHt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_update_XHt.md)
  : Difference equations isolating the humans, forced with Ztrace

- [`Update_XHt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_XHt.md)
  : Update X states for a discrete time system

- [`Update_MYt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_MYt.md)
  : Update States for a Adult Mosquito Model

- [`Update_Lt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Update_Lt.md)
  :

  Update state variables (**L** module)

### Solving

Wrappers around the derivatives functions that handle time and parse
outputs

- [`xds_solve()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_solve.md)
  : Solve a Dynamical System

- [`xds_solve(`*`<dde>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_solve.dde.md)
  : Solve a System of Delay Differential Equations

- [`xds_solve(`*`<ode>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_solve.ode.md)
  : Solve a System of Ordinary Differential Equations

- [`xds_solve(`*`<dts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_solve.dts.md)
  : Solve a Discrete-Time System

- [`xds_stable_orbit()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_stable_orbit.md)
  : Compute stable orbits

- [`xds_stable_orbit(`*`<dts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_stable_orbit.dts.md)
  : Compute the stable orbit for a discrete time system

- [`xds_stable_orbit(`*`<xde>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_stable_orbit.xde.md)
  : Compute stable orbit for a system of differential equations

- [`xds_steady()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_steady.md)
  :

  Solve for the steady state of a system of equations using
  [rootSolve::steady](https://rdrr.io/pkg/rootSolve/man/steady.html)

- [`xds_steady(`*`<ode>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_steady.ode.md)
  :

  Solve for the steady state of a system of equations using
  [rootSolve::steady](https://rdrr.io/pkg/rootSolve/man/steady.html)

- [`xds_steady(`*`<dde>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_steady.dde.md)
  :

  Solve for the steady state of a system of equations using
  [rootSolve::steady](https://rdrr.io/pkg/rootSolve/man/steady.html)

- [`dts_stable_orbit()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_stable_orbit.md)
  : Solve for the steady state or stable orbit of a system of equations

- [`dts_steady()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/dts_steady.md)
  : Solve for the steady state of a system of equations

## Analysis and Visualization

Methods to compute and output terms

### Compute terms

Methods to compute and transmission terms

- [`average_PR_true()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/average_PR_true.md)
  : Compute the average True PR
- [`average_EIR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/average_EIR.md)
  : Compute the average EIR
- [`parse_orbits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_orbits.md)
  : parse the outputs of an object created by xde_solve or dts_solve
- [`parse_y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_y.md)
  : parse the output of an object returned by deSolve
- [`parse_L_terms()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_L_terms.md)
  : Pull L Terms
- [`parse_MY_terms()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_MY_terms.md)
  : Pull MY Terms
- [`parse_XH_terms()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_XH_terms.md)
  : Pull XH Terms
- [`parse_bionomics()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_bionomics.md)
  : Pull bionomic parameters
- [`parse_outputs()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_outputs.md)
  : Make Outputs
- [`parse_outputs(`*`<aquatic>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_outputs.aquatic.md)
  : Make Outputs
- [`parse_outputs(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_outputs.eir.md)
  : Make Outputs
- [`parse_outputs(`*`<full>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_outputs.full.md)
  : Make Outputs
- [`parse_outputs(`*`<human>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_outputs.human.md)
  : Make Outputs
- [`parse_outputs(`*`<mosy>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_outputs.mosy.md)
  : Make Outputs

### Plot terms

Basic visualization of the transmission terms

- [`get_XH_out()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_out.md)
  :

  Get **XH** outputs

- [`get_MY_out()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_out.md)
  :

  Get **MY** outputs

- [`xds_plot_EIR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_EIR.md)
  :

  Plot the EIR *vs.* time

- [`xds_lines_EIR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_EIR.md)
  :

  Add lines for the EIR *vs.* time

- [`xds_plot_PR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_plot_PR.md)
  : Plot the prevalence / parasite rate (PR) from a model of human
  infection and immunity

- [`xds_lines_PR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_lines_PR.md)
  : Add lines for the prevalence / parasite rate (PR) from a model of
  human infection and immunity

## Functions and Utilities

stuff that is generally useful

### Utilities

Utilities

- [`print(`*`<xds_obj>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/print.md)
  :

  Print the **`xds`** model object

- [`trigger_setup()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/trigger_setup.md)
  :

  Trigger `setup`

- [`trigger_setup(`*`<static>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/trigger_setup.static.md)
  :

  Trigger `setup`

- [`trigger_setup(`*`<setup>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/trigger_setup.setup.md)
  :

  Trigger `setup`

- [`trigger_setup(`*`<dynamic>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/trigger_setup.dynamic.md)
  :

  Trigger `setup`

- [`diag_inverse()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/diag_inverse.md)
  : Invert a diagonal matrix

- [`approx_equal()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/approx_equal.md)
  : Check if two numeric values are approximately equal

- [`checkIt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/checkIt.md)
  : Check the length of an input value

- [`shapeIt()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/shapeIt.md)
  : Check the shape and dimensions of an model object

- [`list_vars()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/list_vars.md)
  : Set the initial values to the last values of the last simulation

- [`xds_flatten()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/xds_flatten.md)
  : Set the initial values to the last values of the last simulation

- [`ode_to_dde()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/ode_to_dde.md)
  : Compute as DDE

- [`ode_to_dde(`*`<ode>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/ode_to_dde.ode.md)
  : Compute as DDE

- [`ode_to_dde(`*`<dde>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/ode_to_dde.dde.md)
  : Compute as DDE

- [`ode_to_dde(`*`<dts>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/ode_to_dde.dts.md)
  : Compute as DDE

### Change Parameters & Initial Values

Methods to set up basic models

- [`change_H()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_H.md)
  : Change human population density

- [`update_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/update_inits.md)
  : Set the initial values to the last values of the last simulation

- [`last_to_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/last_to_inits.md)
  : Set the initial values to the last values of the last simulation

- [`parse_orbits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_orbits.md)
  : parse the outputs of an object created by xde_solve or dts_solve

- [`parse_y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/parse_y.md)
  : parse the output of an object returned by deSolve

- [`get_inits()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_inits.md)
  : Get the stored initial values, \\y_0\\

- [`get_last()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_last.md)
  : Get the last state

- [`get_H()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_H.md) :
  Get the initial values as a vector

- [`get_PR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_PR.md) :

  Get the *Pf*PR from a Malaria Model

- [`get_PR(`*`<true>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_PR.true.md)
  :

  Get the *Pf*PR from a Malaria Model

- [`get_PR(`*`<lm>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_PR.lm.md)
  :

  Get the *Pf*PR from a Malaria Model

- [`get_PR(`*`<rdt>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_PR.rdt.md)
  :

  Get the *Pf*PR from a Malaria Model

- [`get_PR(`*`<pcr>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_PR.pcr.md)
  :

  Get the *Pf*PR from a MalariasModel

- [`make_indices()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_indices.md)
  : Make indices for all the model variables

- [`trigger_setup()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/trigger_setup.md)
  :

  Trigger `setup`

### Functions

Basic visualization of the transmission terms

- [`F_zero()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_zero.md) :
  The trivial function
- [`make_function(`*`<zero>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.zero.md)
  : Make a Function that is the sum of Two other Functions
- [`makepar_F_zero()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_zero.md)
  : parameters for make_function
- [`F_one()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_one.md) :
  The trivial function
- [`make_function(`*`<one>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.one.md)
  : Make a Function
- [`makepar_F_one()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_one.md)
  : parameters for make_function
- [`make_function(`*`<val>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.val.md)
  : Make a Function that is the sum of Two other Functions
- [`makepar_F_val()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_val.md)
  : parameters for make_function
- [`F_flat()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_flat.md) :
  The trivial function
- [`make_function()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.md)
  : Make a Function
- [`make_function(`*`<sin>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.sin.md)
  : Make a Sine-based Seasonality Function
- [`makepar_F_sin()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_sin.md)
  : parameters for make_function
- [`make_function(`*`<sum>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.sum.md)
  : Make a Function that is the sum of Two other Functions
- [`makepar_F_sum()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_sum.md)
  : parameters for make_function
- [`make_function(`*`<product>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.product.md)
  : Make a Sinusoidal Function
- [`makepar_F_product()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_product.md)
  : parameters for make_function
- [`make_function(`*`<nproduct>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.nproduct.md)
  : Make a Sinusoidal Function
- [`makepar_F_nproduct()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_nproduct.md)
  : parameters for make_function
- [`make_function(`*`<sigmoid>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.sigmoid.md)
  : Make a Sigmoidal Function
- [`makepar_F_sigmoid()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_sigmoid.md)
  : Make Parameters for a Sigmoidal Function
- [`make_function(`*`<sharkfin>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.sharkfin.md)
  : Make a Sharkfin Function
- [`makepar_F_sharkfin()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_sharkfin.md)
  : Make Parameters for a Sharkfin Function
- [`make_function(`*`<sharkbite>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.sharkbite.md)
  : Make a sharkbite Function
- [`makepar_F_sharkbite()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_sharkbite.md)
  : Make Parameters for a sharkbite Function
- [`make_function(`*`<type2>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.type2.md)
  : Make a type2 function for age
- [`makepar_F_type2()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_type2.md)
  : parameters for make_function
- [`make_function(`*`<splinef>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.splinef.md)
  : Make a spline function
- [`make_function(`*`<splineX>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.splineX.md)
  : Make a spline function
- [`make_function(`*`<spline2>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/make_function.spline2.md)
  : Make a spline function
- [`makepar_F_spline()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/makepar_F_spline.md)
  : Make Parameters for a Spline

  : Plot the seasonal pattern

  : Plot the seasonal pattern

  : Plot the seasonal pattern

  : Plot the seasonal pattern

  : Plot the seasonal pattern

  : Plot the Temporal Trend

  : Plot the Temporal Trend

  : Plot the temporal trend

  : Plot the temporal trend

  : Plot the Temporal shock

  : Plot the Temporal Trend

### Get and Set for Spline Trend Functions

Utilities to change the interpolation points

- [`get_trend()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_trend.md)
  : Get the trend parameters
- [`get_trend(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_trend.none.md)
  : Get the trend parameters
- [`get_trend(`*`<Lambda>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_trend.Lambda.md)
  : Get the trend parameters
- [`get_trend(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_trend.eir.md)
  : Get the trend parameters
- [`get_spline()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_spline.md)
  : Get spline interpolation points
- [`get_spline_s()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_spline_s.md)
  : Get spline interpolation points
- [`get_spline_s(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_spline_s.none.md)
  : Get spline interpolation points
- [`get_spline_s(`*`<Lambda>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_spline_s.Lambda.md)
  : Get spline interpolation points
- [`get_spline_s(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_spline_s.eir.md)
  : Get spline interpolation points
- [`change_spline()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_spline.md)
  : Set the interpolating points
- [`change_spline(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_spline.none.md)
  : Set yy
- [`change_spline(`*`<Lambda>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_spline.Lambda.md)
  : Set the \\y\\ value for interpolating points
- [`change_spline(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_spline.eir.md)
  : Set yy
- [`change_spline_y()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_spline_y.md)
  : Set yy
- [`change_spline_y(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_spline_y.none.md)
  : Set yy
- [`change_spline_y(`*`<Lambda>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_spline_y.Lambda.md)
  : Set the \\y\\ value for interpolating points
- [`change_spline_y(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_spline_y.eir.md)
  : Set yy
- [`change_shock()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_shock.md)
  : Set the interpolating points
- [`change_shock(`*`<none>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_shock.none.md)
  : Set yy
- [`change_shock(`*`<Lambda>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_shock.Lambda.md)
  : Set the \\y\\ value for interpolating points
- [`change_shock(`*`<eir>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/change_shock.eir.md)
  : Set yy

Move

- [`F_exp()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/F_exp.md) :
  Exponential Function

  : Make inits for RMdts adult mosquito model

  : Run Checks
- [`get_EIR()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_EIR.md)
  : Get the EIR
- [`get_MY_inits.trivial()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_inits.trivial.md)
  : Return initial values as a vector
- [`get_MY_vars(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_MY_vars.trivial.md)
  : Return the variables as a list
- [`get_XH_ix()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_ix.md)
  : Add indices for human population to parameter list
- [`get_XH_vars(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_XH_vars.trivial.md)
  : Get Variables by Name

  Get the feeding rate(s)

  : Get the feeding rate
- [`get_f(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_f.trivial.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

  Get the adult mosquito mortality rate(s)

  : Get the feeding rate
- [`get_g(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_g.trivial.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

  Get the human fraction(s)

  : Get the feeding rate

  : Get the feeding rate

  : Get the patch emigration rates

  : Get the feeding rate
- [`get_sigma(`*`<trivial>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_sigma.trivial.md)
  : Get the feeding rate

  : Get Variables
- [`get_variables(`*`<na>`*`)`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/get_variables.na.md)
  : Get Variables

  : Make a Time Series Function
- [`One_tV()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/One_tV.md) :
  The trivial function
- [`Zero_tV()`](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/reference/Zero_tV.md)
  : The trivial function

  : Setup the Junction for Exogenous traps

  : Set the values of exogenous variables

  : Setup the Blood Hosts Object

  : Set up no blood_hosts

  : Set up no blood_hosts

  : Set static blood feeding search weights

  : Other Blood Hosts

  : Time Spent F_blood_hosts

  : Time Spent F_blood_hosts

  : Time Spent F_blood_hosts

  : blood_hosts Dynamics

  : Setup the Junction for Exogenous sugar

  Set up Mosquito sugar

  : Set the values of exogenous variables

### All vignettes

- [Macdonald's
  Model](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/adult_RM.md):

  Setup](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/BasicSetup.md):
- [Mosquito
  Bionomics](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/Bionomics.md):
- [Blood Feeding &
  Transmission](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/BloodFeeding.md):
- [Cohort
  Dynamics](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/Cohorts.md):
- [Contributing](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/Contributing.md):
- [Delay
  Equations](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/Delays.md):
- [Discrete Time
  Systems](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/DTS.md):
- [Habitats & Mosquito
  Ecology](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/EggLaying.md):

- [Exposure](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/Exposure.md):
- [Ports &
  Junctions](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/Forcing.md):
- [Getting
  Started](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/GettingStarted.md):
- [RAMP Software: A
  History](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/History.md):
- [Hybrid MoI (Multiplicity of Infection) Human
  Model](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/human_hmoi.md):
- [SIS Dynamics: an XH
  Module](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/human_sis.md):

  Component](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/L-interface.md):
- [Progressive Model
  Building](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/ModelBuilding.md):

  Dynamics](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.xds/articles/modular_forms.md):
